text:
FRESNO STATE COLLEGE
October 24, 1957
FRESNO 4, CALIFORNIA
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbaaa, Illinois
Dear Sir:
Dr. Dallas A Tueller, Dean of the College, is interested
in seeing that a copy, of the Syracuse University^ report on
administrative policy and production procedure of formal
courses of instruction by television, is placed in our library.
Would you kindly tell me the cost of this publication.
I would also like to have a copy for my files.
Sincerely,
Edwin Lombard
Director of TV Broadcasting
